headline: AMPLIFY Tracks Supreme Court Cruise Case With Major Implications for Cruise-Ship Injury and Maritime Liability
summary: Oral Argument Set for February 23, 2026MIAMI, Feb. 09, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- AMPLIFY, a PR and earned-media legal marketing firm that closely monitors litigation shaping cruise-ship injury law nationwide, is analyzing the significance of a pending U.S. Supreme Court case that could influence how cruise lines evaluate risk across international ports and itineraries. On February 23, 2026, the Supreme Court of the United States will hear oral argument in Havana Docks Corp. v. Royal Caribbean Cru
